Detailed Description

This class is an edge in a waypoint/navpoly.

Member Function Documentation

bool ChunkWaypoint::Edge::adjacentToChunk (  )  const [inline]

This returns whether this edge is adjacent to a chunk boundary.

Returns:
True if the edge is adjacent to a chunk boundary, false otherwise.

uint32 ChunkWaypoint::Edge::neighbouringVista (  )  const [inline]

This gets the vista bit flags.

Returns:
The vista bit flags.

int ChunkWaypoint::Edge::neighbouringWaypoint (  )  const [inline]

This returns the neighbouring waypoint's index.

Returns:
The index of the neighbouring waypoint if there is one, or -1 if there is none.

Member Data Documentation

uint32 ChunkWaypoint::Edge::neighbour_

This contains adjacency information.

If this value ranges between 0 and 32768, then that is the ID of the waypoint adjacent to this edge. If this value is between 32768 and 65535, then it is adjacent to the chunk boundary. Otherwise, it may contain some vista flags indicating cover, for example, if its value's top bit is 1.

EdgeIndex ChunkWaypoint::Edge::vertexIndex_

The index of the start coordinate of the edge.
